ygData.subject: Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Has this soft cap on resists been confirmed?  Or are we just relying on this uberguild leader that may have a conspiracy against bards? LOL! ~Beatdrop
ygData.messageBody:
Has this soft cap on resists been confirmed? Or are we just relying
on this uberguild leader that may have a conspiracy against bards?
LOL!

~Beatdrop Battledrum


--- In eqbards@y..., James Schuldes <jgs@s...> wrote:
> Not true in my experience. Bard songs that buff resists do still
make a
> difference.
>
> Sylly
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@k...]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 1:05 PM
> To: 'eqbards@y...'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
>
> Bards used to be useful in large raids for their ability to provide
resists,
> but given the influx of uber gear it is not difficult to obtain
unbuffed
> resists in the 150s in multiple areas. Add to that the soft cap on
resists
> and the fact that even with maxed resists many, many spells land
anyway and
> bards have little to no use in a raid.
